Package silhouette.samples

The samples package contains a number of sample files that show how the various shapes supported by Silhouette can be created and drawn on a display.

See:

Class Summary
ColorPaletteCanvas  
EditableTextFrame This sample shows how to create editable text objects and how to use constraints to align objects.
GoFrame This sample shows how to:
ImageFrame This application displays a gif image and resizes the canvas to be the same size as the gif image
InputTextFrame This application echos keypresses over rectangles and prints the name of the rectangle that the keypress occurs over.
LineFrame This application records how many times the mouse cursor hits a line.
TextFrame This class shows some sample text strings drawn in different colors and different fonts.
 

Package silhouette.samples Description

The samples package contains a number of sample files that show how the various shapes supported by Silhouette can be created and drawn on a display. Here is a list of the samples:

  1. GoFrame: Draws a set of rectangles on the screen (called color chips) along with a feedback rectangle. When one of the colored rectangles is selected with the mouse cursor and moved, the feedback rectangle turns to the color of the selected rectangle. This application shows how to create rectangles, composite objects, and a move behavior.

  2. TextFrame: Draws a couple of text shapes on the screen. This application shows how to create text objects.

  3. LineFrame: Draws a line on the screen and two counters that count the number of times a mouse cursor has 1) selected the line, and 2) missed selecting the line. When the mouse cursor is pressed while over the line, the hit counter will be incremented by one; otherwise the miss counter will be incremented by one. This application shows how to create line and text objects, shows how text objects can be positioned, and shows how to write a one shot interactor.

  4. ImageFrame: Draws a gif on the screen and resizes the canvas to be the same size as the gif. This application shows how to create images and how to resize canvases.

  5. EditableTextFrame: Draws a number of editable text shapes on the screen and aligns a number of objects using constraints. If you click on any of the text strings you can start editing them. The constraints will automatically keep objects aligned. Shows how to create editable text shapes and constraints.
